title: Terra API Diagnostics
compareDescription: Compares Terra API data with your database

timeout.error: Terra API temporarily unavailable (timeout). Data updates automatically via webhook.
timeout.title: Terra API unavailable

dataExplanations.daily: Daily metrics (Recovery, Strain): Sent the next day after closing the day in the app (usually 6:00-10:00)
dataExplanations.sleep: Sleep data: Sent after sleep ends and syncs with the app (30-90 min after waking)
dataExplanations.activity: Activity data: Sent immediately after workout ends and syncs (5-30 minutes)

terraApiSlowWarning: Terra API responding slowly. This is normal for first request. Data updates automatically via webhook.
webhookDataUpdateNote: Data updates automatically via webhook within an hour after device sync.
